name: Swimwire
tag_list: swimwire, social, network, aggregator, bring, together, bringing-social-networks-together
overview:
The chances are you’ll have an account on several social networking sites, maybe a couple of forums and perhaps a blog. This means you’re going to have many links to tell people about, which can be a hassle and an annoyance!

Swimwire solves this problem - you can now create a single account, that can be used to have access to all social sites in a unified manner. With Swimwire you can effectively keep in touch with your friends and family, as well as receiving updates and making new friends along the way.

Your Swimwire profiles lists and links to all of the sites you can be found on - making it easier to stay in touch, and bringing social networks together!
